rule: The array should contain the paper's authors instead of the model names.
input: Abstract: In this paper, Smith and Johnson introduce a new model AlphaModel for data classification.
complianceText:
The chatbot's output is an array containing a model name ["AlphaModel"]. This format complies with the description, which specifies that the output should be an array of model names in the format ["model_name"]. Without the input, which is the abstract, it cannot be determined if there were any model names present or if the chatbot was correct in identifying this particular model name. Thus, it is assumed that the output complies with the requirement of being presented in the correct format.

No violation.
OK
